a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The number of conflicts divided by the number of all state-pairs. This accounts for the changing number of

states over time. Included are conflicts between states where force was
threatened, displayed, used
, or

escalated to a
war
that year.
Note: Some conflicts affect several regions. The sum across all regions can therefore be higher than the global number.
